entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
